alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 1:03PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern San Diego County through 200 PM PDT... At 101 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fish Creek Wash, or 8 miles southeast of Hwy 78 Between S2 And Borrego Springs Rd, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Borrego Springs, Ocotillo Wells, Ranchita, Shelter Valley, and Agua Caliente. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
